name: Grow (itch) (Eternal Summer)
description:
WIP entry for My First Game Jam Winter 2022

The guardian of your forest has been injured and needs to recover! All the nearby monsters have taken notice and want to take the #1 spot while the guardian is away...

Protect your guardian at all costs! Use your druid magic to summon trees to barricade the paths leading to you! You only get one seed per day though... Should a monster make it to you, enter into a deadly game of Grow-Sham-Bo! (Rock Paper Scissors). You and the monsters only have one life, so be careful...

And Survive! Just one week is all the guardian needs to recuperate.
